channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 5 of the best free movies to stream on Tubi, Pluto TV and more this week (January 26)
item.description: Prey is one of the five great movies I recommend streaming for free this week.

item.title: VC firm 2150 raises €210M fund to solve cities’ climate challenges
item.description: Europe-based venture fund 2150 raised the money to invest in climate tech startups that help solve cities' carbon footprint.

item.title: La NASA veut utiliser ce logiciel de benchmarking PC gratuit pour ses simulateurs
item.description: L'agence spatiale américaine a lancé une procédure officielle pour valider l'usage de CapFrameX. Ce logiciel de benchmarking bien connu des joueurs PC pourrait servir à auditer les performances vidéo des simulateurs de vol de l'agence.

item.title: Avant la hausse des prix annoncée, ce SSD WD_Black 1 To compatible PC et PS5 qui tourne jusqu’à 7250 Mo/s est soldé à -39 %
item.description: Si vous avez besoin de place dans votre machine, que ce soit un PC ou une console Sony, PC Componentes propose le WD_Black SN7100 1 To pour 121,38 euros au lieu de 199,99 euros.

item.title: Winter Olympics: How to watch, schedule of events, and everything else you need to know about the 2026 Milano Cortina games
item.description:
The Milano Cortina 2026 Winter Olympics are coming up. (Mattia Ozbot/Getty Images)
Mattia Ozbot via Getty Images
The 2026 Winter Olympics are taking place in Italy this year, with all the action taking place in Milan and the Alpine city of Cortina. This year marks the fourth time Italy has hosted the Winter Games; most recently, Turin hosted in 2006. Of the 16 sports that will be featured at the Winter Olympics, there will be 15 returning favorites, including figure skating, Alpine skiing, curling, ice hockey, speedskating, snowboarding, freestyle skiing and ski jumping, and one e...

item.title: Saudi satirist hacked with Pegasus spyware wins damages in court battle
item.description: The London High Court awarded the London-based satirist and human rights activist Ghanem Al-Masarir more than £3 million, after finding the Saudi government hacked his phone and was likely behind a physical attack targeting him in London.

item.title: I'm a shopping expert — here are 12 deals that are actually worth buying at Best Buy's 48-hour flash sale
item.description: Best Buy has launched a 48-hour sale, and as a shopping expert, I've rounded up the 12 best deals worth buying, including TVs, laptops, iPads, and more.

item.title: Lenovo gaming laptops are up to $900 off right now - these are the RTX 5070, 5060, and 5050 models I'd buy personally
item.description: The official Lenovo Store has a handy coupon code you can use right now to get some serious savings on the brand's line-up of gaming laptops.

item.title: Researchers Have Mapped the Universe’s Dark Matter Like Never Before
item.description: This new map is not only the most detailed view of the universe’s invisible scaffolding to date, it also allows astronomers to look deeper into cosmic history.

item.title: « Un énorme écart » : quand Audi et Porsche déchantent face au logiciel Rivian
item.description: Vous vous souvenez du soulagement de VW en signant avec Rivian ? Des fuites internes révèlent aujourd'hui un logiciel incomplet, incapable de gérer correctement une climatisation ou des assistances de conduite avancées. Pour Audi et Porsche, le rêve américain a un goût de code bâclé.

item.title: ‘The Handmaid’s Tale’ Sequel ‘The Testaments’ Is Coming Very Soon
item.description: Chase Infiniti and Ann Dowd star in Hulu's next adaptation set in Margaret Atwood's dystopian but eerily timely world.

item.title: What Marvel movies and TV shows do I need to watch before Wonder Man?
item.description: TechRadar reveals the MCU productions you might want to stream before Wonder Man arrives.

item.title: Ce trou noir primitif est si rapide qu’il défie les lois connues de la physique
item.description: Des astronomes ont observé un trou noir supermassif pour le moins surprenant. Seulement 1,5 milliard d’années après le Big Bang, il se nourrit à un rythme extrême. Au-delà même de la limite théorique établie.

item.title: Comment différencier l’AirTag 1 et l’AirTag 2 lors de votre achat
item.description: Vous voulez le nouvel AirTag 2, mais vous avez peur de repartir avec un vieux modèle de 2021 ? C'est normal : ils se ressemblent comme deux gouttes d'eau. Voici quelques conseils.

item.title: Le retour d’Unlock Talk avec un gros montage PC et double Matinale : voici notre programme Twitch de la semaine
item.description: Notre programme Twitch de la semaine du lundi 26 janvier 2026, c’est juste ici : nous vous donnons rendez-vous, mercredi, jeudi et vendredi sur notre chaîne Frandroidlive, autant pour siroter votre café devant notre Matinale Tech' que pour profiter de la 41e d'Unlock Talk.

item.title: Internal chats show how social media companies discussed teen engagement
item.description: Recently released documents show the big business opportunity that social media companies saw in recruiting teens to their platforms and how they discussed risks that heavy digital engagement could pose. The documents were released last week as part of a major set of trials brought by school districts, state attorneys general, and others against Meta, […]...

item.title: More AI malware has been found - and this time, crypto developers are under attack
item.description: KONNI is using AI-generated backdoors to target crypto bros - and security pros should pay attention.

item.title: 5 things experts want you to know about the data in sleep-tracking devices
item.description: Millions of people rely on apps, devices and sensors to monitor how well they’re sleeping. Your watch says you had three hours of deep sleep. Should you believe it?Millions of people rely on phone apps and wearable devices like rings, smartwatches and sensors to monitor how well they’re sleeping, but these trackers don’t necessarily measure sleep directly. Instead, they infer states of slumber from signals like heart rate and movement, raising questions about how reliable the information is and how seriously it should be taken.The U.S. sleep-tracking devices market generated about $5 billion i...

item.title: The best TVs for sound: from Sony, Panasonic, Hisense and more.
item.description: The best TVs for sound bring you theater-style audio to match their picture performance without adding soundbars or the hassle of a surround system.

item.title: Huawei FreeClip 2 : ces nouveaux écouteurs-bijoux qui ne s’insèrent pas dans l’oreille promettent un son premium [Sponso]
item.description: Avec les Huawei FreeClip 2, le constructeur renouvelle ses écouteurs ouverts au look unique en les dotant d'un son encore meilleur. Lancés à 199,99 euros, ils sont en ce moment affichés avec 30 euros de remise grâce à un coupon.

item.title: Best portable projector of 2025: Tested for streaming and presenting on the go.
item.description: Want to stream or present anywhere - then these are the best mini and handheld projectors we've reviewed.

item.title: OpenAI is working out how much to charge for ChatGPT ads
item.description: OpenAI is reportedly asking a high price to advertise on ChatGPT, around $60 per 1,000 views, or triple what ads on Meta's platform usually cost, according to The Information. Despite the higher price, OpenAI won't be offering advertisers the same level of detailed information that Google and Meta do, such as whether users took any […]

item.title: Payment processors were against CSAM until Grok started making it
item.description: For many years, credit card companies and other payment methods were aggressive about policing child sexual abuse material. Then, Elon Musk's Grok started undressing children on X. The Center for Countering Digital Hate found 101 sexualized images of children as part of its sample of 20,000 images made by Grok from December 29th to January […]

item.title: Le gouvernement veut contraindre TikTok, Snapchat et Instagram à vérifier l’âge de tous les utilisateurs à partir de l’année prochaine
item.description: Interdire les réseaux sociaux aux moins de 15 ans : le gouvernement s’est saisi de la proposition de loi de la députée macroniste Laure Miller pour interdire aux mineurs d’accéder aux réseaux sociaux. Le texte est examiné en séance publique ce lundi 26 janvier.

item.title: JBL’s New Speakers Use AI to Silence Your Favorite Song’s Worst Guitar Solo
item.description: New BandBox speakers can remove parts from your favorite songs so you can play along.

item.title: The best soundbars for all budgets, all tested by us.
item.description: From budget-friendly bars to Dolby Atmos wonders, the best soundbars make it easy to get a serious TV audio upgrade.

item.title: Comment désynchroniser Google Photos de son smartphone ?
item.description: Sur la plupart des smartphones Android, Google Photos est l'application par défaut pour le stockage. Voici comment désynchroniser le logiciel de votre téléphone.

item.title: 650 miles from one charge – Volvo's parent company beats Tesla to the punch with first production-ready solid-state battery
item.description: Geely will commence production of its debut solid-state battery pack this year, edging closer to a 650-mile electric range.

item.title: Tech workers call for CEOs to speak up against ICE after the killing of Alex Pretti
item.description: More than 450 tech workers from companies like Google, Meta, OpenAI, Amazon, and Salesforce have signed a letter urging their CEOs to call the White House and demand ICE leave our cities.

item.title: How to watch T20 World Cup 2026 from anywhere in the world with this VPN deal
item.description: Here's how to watch the T20 World Cup 2026 from anywhere in the world for free with this mega VPN deal.

item.title: TikTok blames its US problems on a power outage
item.description: TikTok says a power outage is causing ongoing issues and outages that started in the US early Sunday morning. In an email to The Verge, TikTok USDS spokesperson Jamie Favazza pointed to a statement posted to the joint venture's newly-created X account, which says the company has been "working to restore our services following a […]

item.title: Monarch Money's budgeting app is 50 percent off for new users right now
item.description: The start of the new year is a great time to get your finances in order, and a good budgeting app can help with that. Instead of laboring over a spreadsheet, you can try one of our favorite budgeting apps for less than usual. Monarch Money is running a sale that gives new users 50 percent off one year of the service, bringing the final cost down to just $50. Just use the code NEWYEAR2026 at checkout to get the discount. Monarch Money makes for a capable and detailed budgeting companion. You can use the service via apps for iOS, Android, iPadOS or the web, and Monarch also offers a Chrome exten...

item.title: Does Dreame Want to Be the Next DJI? It Sure Seems Like It
item.description: The smart home company's first action camera is coming for DJI and GoPro's lunch.

item.title: A powerful AMD gaming desktop is hundreds off at Costco
item.description: Given that RAM has become so expensive to buy recently, you might have considered buying a prebuilt desktop computer. If so, and you’re leaning toward a high-end gaming model, Costco has a model that’s an impressive value at $1,999.99 ($300 off) for members through February 8th. It’s an all-AMD, liquid-cooled machine built into Asus’ ROG […]

item.title: ‘Zootopia 2’ Slithers Home Tomorrow
item.description: Disney's finally taking 'Zootopia 2' out of the theaters and into your home with special features and deleted scenes for you and your kids to pore over.

item.title: Microsoft’s latest AI chip goes head-to-head with Amazon and Google
item.description: Microsoft is announcing a successor to its first in-house AI chip today, the Maia 200. Built on TSMC's 3nm process, Microsoft says its Maia 200 AI accelerator "delivers 3 times the FP4 performance of the third generation Amazon Trainium, and FP8 performance above Google's seventh generation TPU." Each Maia 200 chip has more than 100 […]

item.title: Microsoft announces powerful new chip for AI inference
item.description: Maia comes equipped with over 100 billion transistors, delivering over 10 petaflops in 4-bit precision and approximately 5 petaflops of 8-bit performance — a substantial increase over its predecessor.

item.title: Microsoft unveils Maia 200, its 'powerhouse' accelerator looking to unlock the power of large-scale AI
item.description: With over 100 billion transistors, Maia 200 offers "powerhouse" AI inferencing possibilites, Microsoft says.

item.title: I tested the world's fastest 12mm lens – should you buy the Sigma 12mm f/1.4 DC | C lens?
item.description: The Sigma 12mm f/1.4 DC | Contemporary is the only mirrorless APS-C lens to simultaneously boast a wide 12mm focal length and bright f/1.4 maximum aperture – all wrapped up in a light and portable package.

item.title: Elegoo dévoile la Centauri Carbon 2 : une imprimante 3D pensée pour le foyer
item.description: L'impression 3D prend un second souffle avec l'arrivée des constructeurs chinois. Elegoo avec sa nouvelle Centauri Carbon 2 vise un usage plus domestique.

item.title: La France déploie Visio, son outil censé remplacer Microsoft Teams et Google Meet
item.description: Après un an d'expérimentation, le gouvernement généralise Visio, son logiciel de visioconférence. Objectif : se passer de Google, Microsoft et consorts.

item.title: Animal Crossing : New Horizons propose sa version Switch 2 au meilleur prix pendant les Soldes
item.description: Animal Crossing : New Horizons a incontestablement été le jeu du premier confinement. En proposant un univers mignon sur une île colorée, il a permis au monde entier de s'évader. Sa version Switch 2 est actuellement disponible pour 47,89 euros au lieu de 64,99 euros.

item.title: Nvidia invests $2B to help debt-ridden CoreWeave add 5GW of AI compute
item.description: CoreWeave will also integrate Nvidia's products across its platform, including the new Rubin chip architecture.

item.title: Blizzard lines up WoW, Overwatch, Hearthstone and Diablo showcases
item.description: While we got a peek at a few Xbox Game Studios projects during last week’s Developer Direct event, neither Bethesda nor Activision Blizzard made appearances. Fans of several Blizzard franchises won’t need to wait too long to find out what’s next for their favorite games, though, as the publisher has lined up several showcases to help mark its 35th anniversary.The developer-led streams will include “major game announcements,” according to Blizzard. They’ll all air over the next few weeks. Here’s where and when you can watch each stream:January 29. 12PM ET — World of Warcraft State of Azeroth (Y...

item.title: WhatsApp va devoir respecter les règles de transparence en Europe, mais uniquement pour ses chaînes publiques
item.description: WhatsApp fait maintenant partie du club du règlement européen sur les services numériques : les très grandes plateformes en ligne épinglées ont des obligations supplémentaires en termes de transparence et de modération. Dans le cas de la messagerie, elles ne s'appliquent qu'aux chaînes publiques, pas aux conversations privées.

item.title: Sony change ses plans : pourquoi vous allez garder votre PS5 beaucoup plus longtemps
item.description: Les rumeurs allaient bon train, mais un analyste réputé vient calmer les ardeurs des technophiles pressés. Si vous économisiez déjà pour la PlayStation 6, vous pouvez relâcher la pression : Sony semble bien décidé à étirer la carrière de sa console actuelle plus longtemps que prévu.

item.title: Android 17 : Google prépare un effet de flou généralisé inspiré d’Apple
item.description: Google travaillerait sur l’intégration généralisée d’effets de flou sur Android, une esthétique qui rappelle fortement les choix de design d'Apple avec son Liquid Glass.

item.title: Bonne nouvelle chez Free qui propose de belles évolutions pour ce forfait 5G à destination des pros
item.description: Free propose quelques améliorations bienvenues pour son forfait 5G à destination des professionnels. Voici ce qu'il faut retenir.

item.title: These NYC real estate brokers are facing a sex-trafficking trial that could send them to prison for life
item.description: Prosecutors say Tal, Oren, and Alon Alexander sexually assaulted, trafficked, and raped dozens of women from 2008 to 2021. The brothers operated in the glitz and glamour of the Hamptons and South Beach. Two were high-end real estate brokers dubbed “The A Team.” The third went to law school and ran their family’s private security firm, which caters to heads of state and the rich and famous.They frequented nightclubs, cruised on yachts and flew on private jets. One lived alongside celebrities and corporate titans on Manhattan’s Billionaires’ Row. The others had multimillion-dollar waterfront man...

item.title: Selon AMD, la vitesse de votre RAM n’a (presque) plus d’impact sur vos FPS
item.description: AMD déclare que la vitesse de votre RAM n'a finalement que peu d'incidence sur les performances en jeu.

item.title: TikTok USA is broken
item.description: TikTok has suffered from extensive problems on its first weekend after completing a transaction that changed the ownership of its US arm. According to Downdetector, the issues initially spiked in the early hours of Sunday morning, but many users, including editors here at The Verge, are still reporting errors. On Monday morning, TikTok USDS head […]...
